description: This schema represents a single measurement of amount of calories burned in kilocalories (kcal)either as a single measurement, or as the result of aggregating several measurements made over time (see Descriptive statistic schema for a list of aggregate measures) median).

references.description: The LOINC code represents Calories burned:Power = Energy/Time:Point in time:^Patient:Quantitative, that is, a Quantitative measure of Calories burned by a Patient at a Point in time

effective_time_frame.description: As a measure of a phenomenon that occurs over a period of time, calories burned should not be associated to a date time time frame. Hence, effective time frame is restricted to be a time interval.

statistic_time_denominator.description: As a measure of a duration, sleep duration cannot be associated to a date time time frame. Hence, effective time frame is restricted to be a time interval.
